title: Not Paranoid, But Prepared
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ugh~, that hurts......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Are you okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahaha, calm down. Sorry for scaring you. It’s embarrassing to be a high school student who fell down like this...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Anyone can trip and fall at the wrong time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Wait, Yoshiko-chan...... Are you following me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Not particularly. And it’s Yohane. Anyway, here, I have bandages for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Thank you~ You’re thoroughly prepared, Yoshiko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Because I always have to use them...... NOT! And it’s Yo-ha-ne!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Oh, okay. Thanks again. Once I put this on, we can go practice again—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You have to clean the wound before you put it on! Come on, Honoka~! Can you walk? We have to go get tap water!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
